pages.text: Centuries ago, the Aether's elders foresaw catastrophic dangers from easy access to the End. To protect all realms, they crafted 16 unique Eyes and scattered them across dimensions, hidden within structures and guarded by dangerous creatures. Only the most worthy adventurers, through courage, wisdom, and strength, could gather these Eyes and unlock the gateway to the End.

Opening a portal to the End is no small feat. Instead of simply gathering Ender Pearls and Blaze Powder, you must embark on a quest to find up to 16 different eyes.$(br2)You'll need 12 unique eyes to open the end portal, though an Eye of Ender can be one.
$(l)Locations of the Eyes$() $(br2)- $(l)Old Eye$(): Found in Desert Pyramids. $(br2)- $(l)Nether Eye$(): Located in Nether Fortresses. $(br2)- $(l)Cold Eye$(): Discovered in Igloos.
- $(l)Rogue Eye$(): Hidden in Jungle Pyramids. $(br2)- $(l)Black Eye$(): Buried in Buried Chests. $(br2)- $(l)Magical Eye$(): Dropped by Evokers.
- $(l)Lost Eye$(): Found in Mineshafts. $(br2)- $(l)Corrupted Eye$(): Located in Pillager Outposts. $(br2)- $(l)Wither Eye$(): Dropped by The Wither.
- $(l)Guardian Eye$(): Obtained by killing the Elder Guardian. $(br2)- $(l)Witch Eye$(): Crafted using witch ingredients. $(br2)- $(l)Cursed Eye$(): Found in Bastion Remnants.
- $(l)Exotic Eye$(): Crafted using aquatic items. $(br2)- $(l)Evil Eye$(): Purchased from a master cleric. $(br2)- $(l)Undead Eye$(): Crafted using an Undead Soul.
- $(l)Cryptic Eye$(): Chance to get when enchanting items.
